thread.title: Why Some Pros Favor Closed-End Bond Funds Right Now
thread.title_full: Why Some Pros Favor Closed-End Bond Funds Right Now - WSJ

author: Daisy Maxey
title: Why Some Pros Favor Closed-End Bond Funds Right Now
text:
In anticipation of the Federal Reserve raising interest rates, some investors are shifting dollars to cash and other low-risk holdings. But some professional investors suggest going in the opposite direction and embracing bond funds that come with amped-up interest-rate risk.
The funds in question are closed-end bond funds that typically use leverage, or borrowed money, to magnify their income distributions and their returns. If... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
